comments.author: Jonathan Moore
comments.body:
This patch contains some additional unit tests for TestProtocolRequirements to capture some additional MUSTs and MUST NOTs from the RFC. The current implementation already passes all these, so these are mostly useful as documentation and refactoring safety net.

This patch is contributed with the permission of my employer.

summary: additional conditional compliance tests for the caching module for Content-Encoding, Content-Location, Date, Expires, Server, Transfer-Encoding, and Vary headers
